text: Sean Duval Price (March 17, 1972- August 8, 2015) was an American rapper. He was a member of the hip hop supergroups Boot Camp Clik and Random Axe with Guilty Simpson and producer Black Milk. He came to fame as one-half of the duo Heltah Skeltah, performing under the name Ruckus, or in short Ruck, along with partner Rock. ==Death== On August 8, 2015, Price died in Brooklyn at the age of 43. The cause of death is currently unknown, but it was reported that he died in his sleep. He is survived by his wife, and his three children." ==Discography== Studio albums *Monkey Barz (2005) *Jesus Price Supastar (2007) *Mic Tyson (2012) *Imperius Rex (2017) ==References== ==Other websites== *Duck Down Records website * Category:1972 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Rappers from New York (state) Category:Musicians from Brooklyn Category:Unexplained deaths
title: Sean Price
